main_topic.author: Benjamin Maréchal
main_topic.title: `keyword.py` only contains places, no people, no things
main_topic.content:
Hi !

I expected keywords.py to contain examples of places, people and things. Instead, it only contains places in three categories : 'country', 'city', and 'landmark'.

What am I missing here?

comments.author: OminousDude
comments.content: They will add more any day now but for right now there are only places.
